message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160.
I'm still a bit far from $160. How about we meet at $140? I really like the product and I'm willing to pay a bit more than my initial offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $152.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, $152 is still a bit too high for me. How about we meet at $145? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I really need to stay within my budget.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $155.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. How about we meet at $148? I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd like to try to get a good deal on this product.

I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $150. That's my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $148 and $150, so I'll offer it to you for $149.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $149. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go. I'm starting to get a bit worried that I might not be able to get this product at a price I like, and I'm considering buying it from John for $120.
